vernac_cmds: CoInductive exteq : infseq T -> infseq T -> Prop := exteq_intro : forall x s1 s2, exteq s1 s2 -> exteq (Cons x s1) (Cons x s2).
Lemma exteq_inversion : forall (x1:T) s1 x2 s2, exteq (Cons x1 s1) (Cons x2 s2) -> x1 = x2 /\ exteq s1 s2.
intros x1 s1 x2 s2 e.
change (hd (Cons x1 s1) = hd (Cons x2 s2) /\ exteq (tl (Cons x1 s1)) (tl (Cons x2 s2))).
case e; clear e x1 s1 x2 s2.
Lemma exteq_refl : forall s, exteq s s.
Lemma exteq_sym : forall s1 s2, exteq s1 s2 -> exteq s2 s1.
Lemma exteq_trans : forall s1 s2 s3, exteq s1 s2 -> exteq s2 s3 -> exteq s1 s3.
intros (x1, s1) (x2, s2) (x3, s3) e12 e23.
case (exteq_inversion _ _ _ _ e12); clear e12; intros e12 ex12.
case (exteq_inversion _ _ _ _ e23); clear e23; intros e23 ex23.
Arguments exteq_inversion [T x1 s1 x2 s2] _.
Definition extensional (P: infseq T -> Prop) := forall s1 s2, exteq s1 s2 -> P s1 -> P s2.
Lemma extensional_and_tl : forall (P Q: infseq T -> Prop), extensional P -> extensional Q -> extensional (P /\_ Q).
intros P Q eP eQ s1 s2 e.
apply eP with (Cons x s1); [constructor; assumption | assumption].
apply eQ with (Cons x s1); [constructor; assumption | assumption].
Lemma extensional_or_tl : forall (P Q: infseq T -> Prop), extensional P -> extensional Q -> extensional (P \/_ Q).
intros P Q eP eQ s1 s2 e.
left; apply eP with (Cons x s1); [constructor; assumption | assumption].
right; apply eQ with (Cons x s1); [constructor; assumption | assumption].
Lemma extensional_impl_tl : forall (P Q: infseq T -> Prop), extensional P -> extensional Q -> extensional (P ->_ Q).
intros P Q eP eQ s1 s2 e.
apply eQ with (Cons x s1); [constructor; assumption | idtac].
Lemma extensional_not_tl : forall (P: infseq T -> Prop), extensional P -> extensional (~_ P).
intros P eP s1 s2 e; destruct e; simpl.
apply eP with (Cons x s2); trivial.
Lemma extensional_now : forall (P: T -> Prop), extensional (now P).
Lemma extensional_next : forall (P: infseq T -> Prop), extensional P -> extensional (next P).
intros P eP s1 s2 exP; destruct exP; simpl.
Lemma extensional_consecutive : forall (P: T -> T -> Prop), extensional (consecutive P).
Lemma extensional_always : forall (P: infseq T -> Prop), extensional P -> extensional (always P).
apply cf with s1; try assumption.
Lemma extensional_weak_until : forall (P Q: infseq T -> Prop), extensional P -> extensional Q -> extensional (weak_until P Q).
apply cf with s1; try assumption.
Lemma extensional_until : forall (P Q: infseq T -> Prop), extensional P -> extensional Q -> extensional (until P Q).
intros P Q eP eQ s1 s2 e un1; genclear e; genclear s2.
intros s2 e; apply U0; apply eQ with s; assumption.
apply eP with (Cons x s); assumption.
Lemma extensional_release : forall (P Q: infseq T -> Prop), extensional P -> extensional Q -> extensional (release P Q).
Lemma extensional_eventually : forall (P: infseq T -> Prop), extensional P -> extensional (eventually P).
intros P eP s1 s2 e ev1.
induction ev1 as [s1 ev1 | x1 s1 ev1 induc_hyp].
Lemma extensional_inf_often : forall (P: infseq T -> Prop), extensional P -> extensional (inf_often P).
intros P eP; apply extensional_always; apply extensional_eventually; assumption.
Lemma extensional_continuously : forall (P: infseq T -> Prop), extensional P -> extensional (continuously P).
intros P eP; apply extensional_eventually; apply extensional_always; assumption.

command: intros x1 s1 x2 s2 e.
change (hd (Cons x1 s1) = hd (Cons x2 s2) /\ exteq (tl (Cons x1 s1)) (tl (Cons x2 s2))).
case e; clear e x1 s1 x2 s2.
intros (x1, s1) (x2, s2) (x3, s3) e12 e23.
case (exteq_inversion _ _ _ _ e12); clear e12; intros e12 ex12.
case (exteq_inversion _ _ _ _ e23); clear e23; intros e23 ex23.
intros P Q eP eQ s1 s2 e.
apply eP with (Cons x s1); [constructor; assumption | assumption].
apply eQ with (Cons x s1); [constructor; assumption | assumption].
intros P Q eP eQ s1 s2 e.
left; apply eP with (Cons x s1); [constructor; assumption | assumption].
right; apply eQ with (Cons x s1); [constructor; assumption | assumption].
intros P Q eP eQ s1 s2 e.
apply eQ with (Cons x s1); [constructor; assumption | idtac].
intros P eP s1 s2 e; destruct e; simpl.
apply eP with (Cons x s2); trivial.
intros P eP s1 s2 exP; destruct exP; simpl.
apply cf with s1; try assumption.
apply cf with s1; try assumption.
intros P Q eP eQ s1 s2 e un1; genclear e; genclear s2.
intros s2 e; apply U0; apply eQ with s; assumption.
apply eP with (Cons x s); assumption.
intros P eP s1 s2 e ev1.
induction ev1 as [s1 ev1 | x1 s1 ev1 induc_hyp].
intros P eP; apply extensional_always; apply extensional_eventually; assumption.
intros P eP; apply extensional_eventually; apply extensional_always; assumption.
